about_the_game:
"There's something oddly satisfying about tossing trash into a garbage can!"
This unique game lets you experience that everyday moment over and over again.

Key Features

  • The Thrill of Tossing Trash: Press the Spacebar to adjust your throwing power, then release to aim for a perfect shot into the trash can.

  • Sit Back and Watch: Simply watching the trash can might reveal things you’ve never noticed before. Relax and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of your room.

  • Customization Options: By unlocking a certain achievement, you’ll be able to change the type of trash you throw or even move the trash can around.

Controls

  • Spacebar: Adjust the throwing power; release to toss your trash.

  • Esc Key: Reset the tossed trash.

Additionally, after unlocking specific achievements and restarting the game, you’ll discover new ways to interact. Try to find them all!

It’s a simple yet surprisingly addictive experience. Enjoy the refreshing sensation of aiming your trash perfectly and the soothing world of gazing at the trash can at your own leisure!

name: Trashcan Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

short_description: The moment you throw something into the trash can is an exciting moment in your daily life. Through this game, you can enjoy the exciting moments of your life over and over again! You might discover something new by staring at the trash can in the room.
